data.actual_result: Switch for Foreground Game Detection service turns itself back on after a few seconds.
data.expected_result: Switch for Game Detection service should stay disabled
data.short_description: Foreground Game Detection service turns itself back on after disabling (visual bug)
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Game settings  - Enable Foreground Service For Game Detection  - Leave settings  - Open a game (in this case Clash Royale)  - Go back to game settings  - Disable Foreground Game Detection  - Wait and observe
